sources.description:
Royal rumble on a farâ€‘flung island - A reluctant heir must trade the ring for a crown before his homeland is lost for good

Tipo Tairu (Sabu), a rising boxing contender living in America, discovers that his tiny South Seas island homeland faces a looming takeover and a highâ€‘stakes political treaty. Leaving behind the bright lights of the ring, he returns to confront schemes spun by Borodoff, and rally his people before the drums signal a new ruler.

Original Title: Savage Drums (1951) | AKA: Drums of the Wild
